post.body: Yeah, I hear it... In it's own way, it's pretty hot. OH!! I'm planning out that Daran/Stephen/Butch fic!!
I'll do that!! I love him as Norm the Genie, lmao. Just a perfect role...
OMG!!! "They'd forget about it..."
"I'M SO PROUD OF YOU JON!!" <3 Alec Baldwin SOOO much!!
"I-I've had pizza. ^_^" Such a cutie. And LOL at schlepping... I didn't even know that!
"My grandmother passed away from Alzheimers." "Did she?" "Yes, I told you that before the show..." LOOOVE.
AW!! Jon's a smarty!!
WTF?! Why did I not know this?! I love everyone in that sentence!!
LMAO!! Now whenever I listen to that song, I will think of this and laugh. XD
The Blair Thumb is HILARIOUS. Thumb Wars has to be my fave though. ^_^
I LOVE YOU.
Not old enough. Only 18, not legal for me to drink yet.
XD That worked! *hugs* ILY2!
I will! :-)
My friend had told me about the movie a few years back, but that was before I knew who he was... I'll ask her to borrow it.
Oh my god, I need to see that movie now. I love Phil Hartman... :-(
You're still the one that can scratch my itch! <333
I'm tired and I'm getting a cold. I'm also depressed for some reason. Someone cheer me up?
Five in the morning and I'm just now going to sleep. Watched Team America though, got to hear Daran say "suck my cock". SO worth it!!
"Are you Cosmo" "That's what it says on my undies! And they've never lied to me before!"
